ygData.subject: RE: berzerker
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually if you see the berzerker frenzy message it is too late to run then. I really haven t noticed anything special about it, except that it raises strength
ygData.messageBody:
Actually if you see the berzerker frenzy message it is too late to run then.
I really haven't noticed anything special about it, except that it raises
strength and lowers agility. But thats it. It takes experience to know
when to run. As a general rule if I get below half a full bar of health and
the creature isn't close to the same (in a solo situation) then I will turn
and start running. That leaves enough hit points to hopefully make it to a
safe spot. Berzerker frenzy is like giving a caster 20 extra hit points
when they get down to 35% of health :)

Angarth Bladedancer, Warrior of the 21st Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"


> ----------
> From: mark mark[SMTP:markerob@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 12:06 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] berzerker
>
> From: "mark mark" <markerob@...>
>
> hey guys,,, need some advise with this.
> I would like to know if I'm using berzerker right. From my experience it
> only kicks in when my hp's are really low,, just before that point where I
>
> need to run; however usually by the time it kicks in I am only a hit or
> two
> from the point where I can no longer run... well that is unless I am very,
>
> very close to a zone, which dosn't happen very often. So the only
> realistic
> use I can think of is a reminder that I need to evaluate my situation and
> think about getting out of there while I can, if possible. My hits don't
> seem to change much when I enter berzerker either, can't say that for the
> mobs though. They hit me twice as hard with almost every hit when they
> get
> down to one bubble, very annoying to loose one bubble of hp for most of
> the
> fight and then two bubbles while you are just finishing them off. Hey, If
>
> there is any stradegy to using it please let me know,,,,, I really want
> to,
> but can't figure out how......need every bit of help I can get 8)
>
> Arathorne, Solsek Ro
>
